content: Hello, here I bring you an opportunity that you should not miss at only 10% of its value.- Cumulative: If you already have credit and want to add more, you can add it without problem.- Cost: The value of the credits is 10% of their original value, negotiable for high value credits- Durability: The 100k credits are only for a part of an event so they will last until the 31st - 12th of next year 2023. (I only have 1 of 100k credits available).The buyer must take into account the following:- The payment method: it can be by BTC or PAYPAL.- The payment of the product must be verified before the user can agree to obtain the corresponding eligible credit.- The delivery of the product will correspond to the time it takes to be verified, normally between 10 to 20 minutes.MANDATORY: The buyer must take into account the necessary knowledge of what he is acquiring and consult all his doubts before buying.WARRANTY: The user must have teamviewer to attach the corresponding credits if he wishes, it is not necessary if the user wishes to use the product himself.All the credits are 100% legitimate and are delivered once the payment is confirmed within the established term, in the case of BTC payments they will depend on the traffic.SCHEDULE: Availability from Monday to Saturday, I do not work on Sundays, I do not ask for payments or give credits in advance.The user must be connected to the Internet and dedicate at least 30 minutes of his time to complete the purchase and acquisition of the product as quickly as possible.EVENT UNTIL DECEMBER 23, FOR THE PURCHASE OF CREDITS OF 25k and 50k YOU PARTICIPATE IN A DRAW FOR A CREDIT OF 100k WHICH IS THE ONLY AVAILABLE - YOU CAN ALSO PURCHASE IT UPON REQUEST.CONTACT: You can choose to contact me by this means or directly to my Telegram: https://t.me/HebertGx
